rooms.instructions:
You walk into room 120. 
There is a whiteboard to your left, and plenty of tables and chairs.
What would you like to do?

optionsResults.option: Brayden walks by offers a tutoring session

result:
Congratulations, you learned stuffs.
You earned 10 smarts

You went down a rabbit hole, and learned nothing. 
You lost an additional 5% battery.

optionsResults.option:
Attempt to push to github. 
You have added and committed your changes.

result:
You earned enough smarts to successfully deploy to Heroku! 
Congratulations! You completed the Boot Camp!
You need more smarts to figure out Heroku.

rooms.instructions:
You walk into room 150...you hear 'hello folks!' 
You know Sarah is here to save the day! 
You have several options in this room to gain some smarts. 
What would you like to do?

optionsResults.result: We need to name our variable something meaningful.

result:
Boot Camp Spot is working today! 
You earned 5 smarts.

BCS is down again. 
You lost an additional 5% of battery

optionsResults.option:

line of code.

result:

optionsResults.result:

result: You plugged into the outlet and earned 10% battery.

You're lucky this outlet didn't fry your computer, however, 
you did NOT get any battery life.

You successfully collaborated with your team. 
You earned 10 smarts.

You all went down a BAD path, and learned nothing.
